Name: Pixel Puzzles Junior Jigsaw
About the game: Pixel Puzzles Junior is the perfect puzzle game for kids aged 2-5. With 50 bright and colourful puzzles included, Pixel Puzzles Junior lets kids choose the puzzle size that's best for them. All puzzles can be played in a range of sizes, from 9, 20, 30, 42 and 56 pieces. Avoid the mess of traditional jigsaw puzzles and let the kids play their puzzles digitally. FEATURES: A range of sizes from 9 to 56 pieces. Perfect for ages 2 - 5. Bright cartoon puzzle images. Colorful puzzling atmosphere. Auto Saving, never lose progress. Traditional puzzle gameplay. Interactive play environment.
